transArray.content: The front desk of the hotel is very clean and tidy. The service of the young lady at the front desk is also very good. She is also very enthusiastic to us. She recommends nearby food and places to visit. The room is also very clean.

Dear guests: Hello! Thank you for choosing to stay. Although the words are simple, they give us the greatest affirmation and support for our work. We will continue to work hard to do better. Thank you for staying. We sincerely look forward to meeting you again. I wish you a happy life!
